name: UserAdoption
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Want to improve user adoption for your business?
Listen to audio interviews with actionable advice on how to do this from a variety of perspectives.

Just ask "Alexa, play user adoption podcast" or include it in your flash briefing
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
